story:
Story of My Book

Surrounded by Awesome Women, Unlocking the New Model of Women's Success in Business and Entrepreneurship for the Next Decade is a startup business incubator model developed after five years of research working with women who run their own businesses. It includes a roadmap of how to succeed as a business owner, with key milestones documented and an understanding of the typical emotions faced at each phase of business ownership.  

My name is Sheila Long and I wrote this book because I want to see more women in business starting, leading, and growing companies. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover what is normal for entrepreneurs at each phase of running a business, including attaining encouragement and support. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for women leading businesses from idea contemplation to the business expansion. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand that success is defined differently for women at each phase of their business.

In this book, you'll learn about why women choose to exit the corporate ladder and do not hire more than five employees when they grow their businesses or sales. You'll read stories like...
  • A woman who built a company with 170 pro bono coaches in thirty countries, focused on young women and social change makers.
  • Another woman that distributed and manufactured a medical device product which allows patients to get an ECG heart reading in seconds from their home.  
  • A TV critic whose life was altered while interviewing a celebrity.

You will love this book if you are a woman in the forty to fifty age range, or if you are contemplating starting a business. You will also enjoy this book if you are a man who understands that women’s viewpoints are unique and is interested in addressing gender inequality.

Surrounded by Awesome Women, Unlocking the New Model of Women's Success in Business and Entrepreneurship for the Next Decade is a nonfiction book that speaks to those speaks to those individuals who would like to build the ideal business structure and see it thrive.

 

The Book


The book is written in three parts.

Part 1 contains the Introduction and Chapters 1-5. The traditional view of white men and women with rose-colored glasses is introduced—where the glass ceiling is attainable, and everyone is capable of building an amazing business that makes millions of dollars. It worked for Anne Machesky, who became a financial planner in the 1980s and Amanda Baltz, who built a medical device business by taking advantage of opportunities put in front of her. This section delves into how this view does not work for most women, black, and brown people.  

Part 2 contains Chapters 6-9. The current view of today, where we are at a breaking point, comes to light here complete with a story of how I got sick and had to leave my blossoming corporate career. This section explains the value of accepting sorrow and betrayal, while adequately consoling ourselves from broken dreams. Only after this, can we accept our true reality of support and forge a realistic professional path forward.

Part 3 contains Chapters 10-12. The solution is rolled out here with the Startup Sales Incubator. It explains the role of Sexism and Networking and how it shapes women’s professional growth. When women have the right support and self-assessment mechanisms in place, we can grow and expand our businesses. We are inspired with the story of Cindy Machles, who is growing an Advertising business in New York City and Hannah Anderson, who has expanded her dog treat business nationally.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring, 2021.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowlegements section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • You will be eligible to purchase some fun add-on items with my book.

And much more!

 

About the Author

Sheila Long believes in encouraging and showcasing professional women. After working at Motorola for over a decade in Sales, Quality, and Service Management, she witnessed women leaving the workforce and not re-entering or becoming business owners. Compelled to make a change for the betterment of women’s careers, she founded MalamaDoe - A Coworking Community for Women. Ever since then, she has incubated and developed women startups as they move through the model described in this book.  

Sheila received her MBA in Strategy and Finance from the Booth School of Business at the University of Chicago. She currently serves as the Vice President and City Ambassador Liaison for the Chicago Booth Women’s Network. Sheila speaks fluent Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. She earned International Business, Economics and Spanish degrees from Saint Louis University where she enjoyed four semesters on their campus in Spain, fine tuning her cultural knowledge. 

Sheila wrote this book to help more women thrive as business owners. She hopes women can find a sense of community and use the terms in this book to better understand themselves and advocate for needed support to allow growth. She is curious to find out where readers fall on the incubator model discussed in this book and how we can best propel women forward into leading more companies.  

For more information, you can connect with Sheila at SheilaLongAuthor@gmail.com and on Instagram and Facebook @SheilaLongAuthor. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SurroundedbyAwesomeWomen and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!


Thanks again,
Sheila Long

------------------------------------------------------------

The Story of Everything I Leave Behind For You

When I was 16, I was held in a mental hospital because of my third attempted suicide. And at 21, I’m graduated from the University of Chicago.

My name is Emily Her and I am the author of Everything I Leave Behind For You.

Mental disorders were "something that other people got", never me. Sitting in my seventh-grade, one-week mental health unit in my middle school science class, I learned what "depression" and "self-harm" were. I watched the 2-hour long movie explain that people with mental disorders are unable to function and lack long-term goals.

But, I'm normal. Depression, anxiety, and mental disorders are all "something that other people got". Not me. 

Hi, I'm Emily! I graduated early from a top university, began my own six-figure creative agency, co-founded a start-up, and work at a competitive consulting firm. How are you?

Hi, I'm Emily! I was diagnosed with depression and anxiety at 11, involuntarily held in a mental hospital at 16 for a third attempted suicide, and asked to drop out of university at 18 due to my eating disorder condition. How are you?

I embody the spitting image of conventional success. I am also the spitting image of those patients I saw in my seventh-grade class.

I was told in my freshman year that if I continued to stay in college, I may not be able to survive because of how much danger my body was in. I’ve struggled with depression, anxiety, and eating disorders since I was 11. It threatened me to drop out of school at various points for inpatient care, and it made me risk my life at my own hands. Unfortunately, I am only one of millions who struggle daily to simply live with myself.

But I also am one of millions who refuse to just be a statistic. 

It took 18 years of my life before I began to understand that I, too, suffer from "something that other people got"; there was no "other people", just humans with a human experience of mental health.

I’m often asked what drives me to keep living during the darkest hours. I used to be lost for an answer and temporarily found security in answering that it was all for a stable future. It was not completely a lie — hope was my greatest weapon that I did not know I had at times. But now, I’ve learned that my will to live and fight is driven by the wish to help as many people as I can reach to never experience the depths that I did.

My therapist tells me that he has never seen so much poison in a girl of my age. My hope, after living in this body of poison for 21 years, is to lessen the world of as much poison as I can. 

For the past year, I have been working on writing my book, “Everything I Leave Behind For You”. I had always been asked by others and myself how I can share my story and lessons with as many as possible, and it was during this past year when I found myself struggling again that the time to help others is always now.

My hope is that my writing will be able to give readers a greater will to live and fight on. No matter what we have crumpled under, are stumbling over, or will be beaten by, we can’t wait for the world and its challenges to pass by before we take charge of our own lives and happiness. Through my book, I recollect memories from conversations, the mental hospital, and therapy in a raw and vulnerable expression of my struggles so that others will not need to experience them. To learn how to find themselves again-- we're all a little bit lost, after all. 

When I first announced my book "Everything I Leave Behind For You" in a previous Linkedin post, I received an overwhelming amount of support. Every stranger who found enough value in my message to reach out to me has completely moved me. You all show me that we are all of a single human experience with shared struggles, heartache, and need for mental well-being. You all motivated me to keep sharing my vulnerabilities. That this will all be worth it. 

A bit less than a week ago I began the preorders of my book. I detail my struggles and learnings in mental health so that hopefully, others will not need to experience what I did. My wish is that future generations will never see mental health as something of "other people" only, but of something that we are all human to. 

It would mean a lot to me if you could help me support my journey by pre-ordering a copy or helping spread the word about mental wellbeing in high-functioning spaces. If you or someone you know are a part of organizations, media groups, or podcasts promoting mental health or life wellness, I would be more than honored to share my experiences with your platform. 

To the small number of you who have backed my book and shared my work, I cannot express how much it moves me when I receive your preorders and warm responses. Thank you for showing an 11-year-old, 16-year-old, and 21-year-old me that there is hope. 

You will love this book if you’re searching for the beginning to conversations about mental health with your friends, family, peers, coworkers, acquaintances, strangers, or yourself. Start the conversations today.

Everything I Leave Behind For You speaks to each of us: from the burnt out working professional to the over-pressured student to the concerned mother or father. How do we begin to understand our human experiences if we never learned to be vulnerable about our own human experiences?

Ultimately, I hope that Everything I Leave Behind For You inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue around topics such as
  • Individual reflection
  • Interpersonal community dynamics
  • Societal stigma surrounding the topic of mental health
  • I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers!
 

What We Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

  • Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published 
  • Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
  • Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author


Emily Her is a recent graduate and a management consultant. She was born and raised in the Bay Area of California, where mental health was a conversation that was not encouraged in the notoriously competitive community. After struggling and fighting for 21 years, she is sharing her story and lessons with the world to experience. Her hope is that with enough conversations and the continued efforts of generations fighting for mental wellness, her challenges that are shared with too many will never need to be repeated in history.

When not overthinking, Emily can be found creating art, eating peanut butter crackers, or listening to chef documentaries.

For more information, you can connect with Emily Her at author.emilyher@gmail.com and Instagram or Linkedin.


 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form (https://forms.gle/tpeHwb4W5zn7hMiG7) to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:
  • At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)
  • Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  • When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #EILBFY and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!
Tag:
Instagram - @emuiu / @newdegreepress
Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/emily-her/

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Emily Her

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #EILBFY and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!Tag:Instagram - @emuiu / @newdegreepressLinkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/emily-her/Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Emily Her

We've moved to Patreon!  https://www.patreon.com/user?u=4033683


We are Cascadia Grove of Ár nDraíocht Féin: A Druid Fellowship (ADF).  We are building a Shrine to Cernunnos, Ancient Celtic Lord of the Forest and God of Liminality, Commerce, and the Underworld.  The Shrine will be located at White Mountain Druid Sanctuary in Trout Lake, Washington state.  

Our main goal in doing this campaign is:

  • to make people aware of White Mountain Druid Sanctuary 
  • to offer people a way of being part of building our latest Shrine  
WMDS is on land owned by Kirk Thomas and Kozen Sampson.  It is a part of Trout Lake Abbey which includes:

  • A B&B on site with rooms, a hostel and camp sites available
  • A Stone Circle with 20 foot pillars 
  • A Labyrinth
  • Several Shrines already built dedicated to The Morrigan, The Dagda, and Lugh.  
  • A commercial kitchen and space for holding retreats and group events
  • A Buddhist Temple  

If you are someone interested in visiting a place that has been created to honor the deities of the ancient Indo-European past, or you wish to deepen your connection to Land Spirits or your Ancestors, or explore Buddhism, this is a place to visit.  

The reason we chose Indiegogo as our crowd funding site is so we can offer perks:

  • an engraved brick at the Shrine 
  • an icon for your home altar
  • a t-shirt.  
The Shrine will get built no matter what.  However, your contribution will help it get built faster and allow us to start on the next Shrine (probably to Bridget).

We welcome people from all backgrounds, cultures, incomes, genders, sexualities, ages, citizenships and abilities.  We ask for visitors to behave as the best versions of themselves with openness, kindness and their best intents and behaviors.  (To see ADF's specific stand on this, follow this link:  https://www.adf.org/blogs/ad/08242016-2118)

Thanks for visiting this website!  Read on for more information specific to the building of the Shrine to Cernunnos.

We raised enough money from our first campaign to build the foundation and walls of the Shrine.  This campaign is intended to raise enough money to build the metal roof, the artwork, the bench and walkway.  

You can see our first campaign and pictures of the Sanctuary here:  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cernunnos-shrine--3/x/11422658#/

August 1st, 2016  

We decided to place the Shrine to Cernunnos at the west end of the Stone Circle, a suitable position for an Underworld god.

The Stone Circle beyond the Shrine foundation looking east.

In an effort to save money and allow us to build the Shrine in the way we think the ancients did - as a community with many people physically helping out - Kirk Thomas, the founder of White Mountain Druid Sanctuary, is learning to build the Shrines himself.

Here are some pictures of the beginning of the project.  After the site was mapped out, Kirk began the process of digging the foundation trench. 

Kirk, Ray, and Umberto finish digging the trench

Then came time to put the rebar in place and pour the concrete. 

The concrete is poured with the upright rebars in place

The following weekend, we started on the walls.  After several hours of standing and thinking and standing and discussing, and then placing bricks and removing them again, we settled on a formation.

First two courses laid out.

Cementing the third course.


7 courses of brick complete

The third course up is actually "grade."  Next we will build the wooden structure to support the metal roof and stucco the walls.  The small square foundation at Kirk's feet is the base of the fire altar (below).


All the concrete blocks complete.  



Wooden walk leading up to the Shrine.  Engraved bricks will be between the wooden walkway and the Shrine.  

August 14th

We've got the Fire Altar built - great job Kirk!  Next onto the roof....

Fire Altar in front of Cernunnos Shrine

Fire Altar in front of Cernunnos Shrine

August 25th
And so the roof begins (below)....

First part of roof on Cernunnos Shrine

August 29th

Rafters have gone up!

Roof on the Cernunnos Shrine
September 6th
More of the roof is filled in and the base coat of stucco is complete.  The dirt area all around the bottom and fire altar is where engraved bricks will go.

Front of the Shrine

Back of the Shrine

Below is an example of the engraved paving brick you can get as a perk.  These bricks will lead up to the Shrine.  This is a 4x8 inch brick (below).  We also have 8x8 inch bricks and 8x8 inch tiles.  The tiles will be attached to the sides of the Shrine.

An example of the engraved brick included in the 4x8 inch Brick Perk and the Featured Perk.  


Wood engraving included in Cernunnos Shrine Icon Perk and Featured Perk.
Our next Shrine will probably be to Bridget, Celtic Hearth Goddess, Fire Tender, and Goddess of Blacksmiths, Poetic Inspiration and Healing.  Her Shrine will be on the opposite side of the Stone Circle from the Cernunnos Shrine.  If we surpass our goal, money will go to complete the Cernunnos Shrine and start on the Bridget Shrine.

This is a view point standing where the Bridget Shrine will be.  You can see the Cernunnos wall directly behind the Axis Mundi.
Here are some other pictures of the Sanctuary. 
 High Day Rituals are held at sunset.  Grumpy face pillar only comes out in the dark (below).

Summer Solstice 2016. 

Labyrinth to the north of the Stone Circle.  Summer 2016



Snowy site of Cernunnos Shrine in February 2016.  The little sticks in the front are incense and that fir tree actually does look like Cernunnos' antlers on top.  To the right is the edge of a small pond that is the planned site for the future Manannan mac Lir Shrine.

story:
My First Cookbook: Kitchen Ritual

As a lifelong lover of cooking, and a professional chef for the last decade, I want to help you transform cooking from something you dread, to an experience you love. And, if you already love to cook, I want to help you enjoy it even more. I believe all of this is accessible to anyone who is willing to approach cooking through the lens of mindfulness. For me, a mindful approach to cooking means enjoying the process from start to finish, not just obsessing over a "perfect" end product. 

Whether you're a seasoned home chef, or someone who gets anxious just thinking about cooking, the 128 plant-based, whole-foods recipes in this book are designed to inspire you to spend more time nourishing yourself. And, while you're at it, you just may begin to eat healthier and perhaps discover some new ingredients you love too!

I've poured my heart and soul into this book over many years and worked with a brilliant team to create a book that is as beautiful as the recipes are delicious. Pre-order your copy now!

Update October 15, 2017: THANK YOU to everyone who helped this campaign reach full funding in just 6 days!!! I'm pleased to announce a STRETCH GOAL challenge: for every $1,000 raised beyond the target goal amount of $8,000, I'll release an additional recipe to all backer in a PDF e-Book format.

Update October 16: The first additional recipe has been unlocked, and we are halfway to unlocking a second bonus recipe for all backers!
 

 

Book Highlights

  • Hardcover, 226 pages
  • Color interior throughout
  • Lavish henna-inspired design theme
  • Beautiful color photography of mouth-watering dishes
  • 128 plant-centered recipes, with gluten-free variations
  • Thoroughly indexed for ease of finding your favorite recipes
  • Printed in the United States


 

Be the First to Have It

The book is completely designed and currently is being printed as you read this. Your contribution covers printing costs for my first run of books. Any money raised in excess of the target goal will be used to reimburse funds already spent on various book-related costs, including photography, indexing and design elements.

Barring any unforeseen issues with the printer, all books should be ready for shipping by mid-November, in time for holiday gift-giving. Check out the perks and consider buying multiple copies to give to friends and family.

Place your order by clicking the BACK IT button above, or click on the perk you'd like to claim.

All pre-orders placed within the first 24 hours following the public launch of this campaign (by Wednesday, October 11 at 8:30 a.m. Pacific) will include signed copies of the book. 

 

What's the Ritual?

When I consider this definition of ritual: “a series of activities performed in a particular place, and performed according to set sequence,” I think it perfectly describes what happens in kitchens worldwide—in homes, five-star restaurants, even roadside snack shacks. The simple act of cooking is itself a ritual, one that I find incredibly sacred. It is the ritual of sustenance, the fount from which our life force energy flows.

As someone who has traveled extensively, I notice that no matter how different the kitchens I’ve visited across the globe may look, there is a core, overarching ritual that transpires within them. Ingredients are procured, various preparations take place, foods are cooked or arranged, then served and enjoyed.

When we cook using whole food ingredients, we are inextricably connected to the rhythmic rituals of the earth itself. We savor ingredients when they are in season and notice when they disappear from the stalls of our farmers market, only to be replaced by something else.

We live in a time where despite all of our many newfangled ways of staying connected, I find that people often feel disconnected—from other people, from nature and from who they truly are. Cooking is one of the simplest and most potent ways I’ve found to remedy this pervasive sense of disconnection, so this book is my contribution to inspiring a more connected planet. I hope you’ll use these recipes to nourish both yourself and others.

 

About Meredith

I ditched a successful corporate career to spend my life nourishing others, and inspiring people to nourish themselves. In addition to offering private chef services for individuals and families, I regularly cater yoga retreats and events centered around mindfulness and conscious living, teach mindful cooking classes, offer cooking demonstrations at festivals and other large events, and consult on recipes for others in the food industry. I am excited to release this book so that even more people can enjoy my approach to food.

I've studied Ayurveda (the ancient healing science indigenous to India) over the past 11 years, and integrate its teachings into my food, including the recipes in my book. I'm a believer that food is our primary source of medicine, and therefore focus on using whole food ingredients that come from plant sources.

In addition to my work in the kitchen, I am also a student and teacher within various mindfulness and yoga traditions. My primary teachers have been Thich Nhat Hanh (I ordained as a lay person in his Plum Village Buddhist tradition in 2013) and Edward Espe Brown (San Francisco Zen Center). I teach meditation and yoga at Los Angeles Juvenile Hall, where I have organized mindfulness-based programming as a volunteer for the past four years.

You can learn more about me and my work at http://pranaful.com, and also get a feel for my style of cooking via the recipes found there. You can find me on Facebook and on Instagram at @pranaful.

 

The Kitchen Ritual Team

It takes an incredible team to build a great book. Here's mine:

Amy Saidens – Designer
Amy is an artist and designer who looks and lives in Brooklyn, NY. Follow her visual adventures on Instagram: @moreplumcakeplease.
 

Tessa Duff & Sammy Miller – Photographers
Tessa Duff and Sammy Miller are partners and co-founders of Blooming Bites Photography, based in Culver City, CA.  Both Tessa and Sammy were trained at Brooks Institute of Photography. They provide irresistible food photography and detailed food styling, all with ease and excitement. http://bloomingbitesphotography.com
 

Nicole Pilar  – Tableware Artist
Brooklyn-based artist Nicole Pilar grew up just north of the city in a log cabin. The proximity to nature greatly influenced her artistic development. As an artist, Nicole explores mediums bringing out their most natural quality in the organic forms as reflected in her jewelry, home and tabletop collections and installations. All of the handmade dishes seen in my book are her creations. Learn more and shop at http://npilar.com

Additional support for the book was provided by numerous others, including Carrie Lederer & Matt Hollingsworth (cover photography), Mallory Greene (editing), Wendy Allex (indexing), Josh Brill (video support for this campaign), Francis DellaVecchia (my husband and #1 taste tester), all the people who tested recipes and provided feedback, and the many friends, clients and others who have supported my culinary career over the last decade.
 

Spread the Word

If you're excited about this book, please tell others. You can use the share tools located near the upper-right corner of this page to easily share my campaign via various social media platforms or send the link by e-mail to friends.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Lisa McMullin. I'm a rookie playwright and screenwriter. I have had SO much help from SO MANY people involved with The London Screenwriters' Festival that I want to pay it forward.

Despite being diagnosed with cancer for the THIRD time and being told it was untreatable, Cate gave up her job to finish her M.A in Screenwriting and try to recover her health through alternative medicine.

She is ALIVE and KICKING ASS and now she has a BRILLIANT screenplay to pitch at the London Screenwriters' Festival.

Help me get her there!

What We Need & What You Get

Cate has had a huge amount of support from the Writers' Guild of South Africa. They have a delegation at the festival this year, which Cate should have been a part of, had circumstances not royally screwed up her plans. 

HOWEVER, the Guild has generously offered to embrace her as part of their delegation, if we can just get her to London and the LondonSWF people have waived her entry fee to help.

We need to buy her a plane ticket from Cape Town to London.

Can you chip in whatever you can as every penny helps.

£1,200 will cover travel costs. If we can raise a further £300 we can upgrade her accommodation from my sofa to a Travelodge! 

Cate's husband, Ian, is an illustrator and we have a selection of gorgeous prints to offer as perks. You can view these in the Images section.

You can also find details of the  wonderful screenplay Cate has written for children called 'The Transmogrifiation of Bunny Crisp':

 https://www.facebook.com/The-lets-get-Cate-to-L...


The Impact

In Cate's own words, this is what it means to her:

"After being diagnosed for the 3rd time with breast cancer in 2015, and told I was now untreatable, I made the decision to resign from my job and focus on  screenwriting. I was awarded my MA in June (with a distinction for my screenplay), I’m still here fighting and now I need to get to the next level of the game. And the London Screenwriters' Festival is where so many people I need to meet will be gathering. I need to be there."

If ever there was a person whose sheer passion and will to create should be supported, Cate is it. Please contribute what you can.

story:
Bonjour à tous !  

  ''La Créatrice'' est une trilogie fantastique que j'ai adoré et que j'adore toujours écrire ! Le premier tome a été accepté dans certaines maisons d'édition. J'ai donc choisi la maison d'édition : Essor-Livres. Cette été, 200 exemplaires seront disponibles, comme étant une ''étude de marché''. Le projet Indiegogo est en fait pour m'aider à démarrer une certaine publicité et organiser un super lancement cet été. Pour réussir à atteindre nos objectifs, nous devons réserver un minimum de 55 livres dans le prochain mois ! ! 

 Cette histoire fantastique est inspirée des plages et de la ville de Matane. Elle vous transportera entre deux mondes. Débutant par le quotidien banal de Mali et s'éclipsant dans un univers unique, magique et désespérément en péril !

J'ai donc choisi la maison d'édition : Essor-Livres. Cette été, 200 exemplaires seront disponibles, comme étant une ''étude de marché''. Le projet Indiegogo est en fait pour m'aider à démarrer une certaine publicité et organiser un super lancement cet été. Pour réussir à atteindre nos objectifs, nous devons réserver un minimum de 55 livres dans le prochain mois ! !  Cette histoire fantastique est inspirée des plages et de la ville de Matane. Elle vous transportera entre deux mondes. Débutant par le quotidien banal de Mali et s'éclipsant dans un univers unique, magique et désespérément en péril !

story:
My Summer (A synopsis of what's to come)

Poetry is not a luxury. Audre Lorde’s words reverberate through my very core whenever I lift a finger to create art in any medium, whether it be poetry, prose, film, or music. My art is not a luxury; it is a weapon.

Last year, I founded BITCH Collective, an artist and activist collective for “bitchy” women. That is to say, women who use their art to speak their minds, fight patriarchal oppression, and disrupt social norms and gender roles. As all the members of this collective grow in our respective mediums and passions, so does the collective itself. Our main goal in forming a collective like this is not only for the community and support, but also to invigorate our art to the point of weaponizing it. Art, I believe, is the most powerful political tool one can have. Centre Pompadour will be an excellent place for finding more people to participate in or light a fire in our movement.

 

My novel, Beachy Head, deals with cultural memory, inherited trauma, re-memory, isolation, and family through the story of a woman slowly regaining repressed memories of her younger sister’s death by encountering her spirit. The woman spends most of her time in isolation, living in a small home atop Beachy Head in Sussex, where she stays awake in order to catch any jumpers that try to make it up to the cliff. My artistic goals generally settle within the space between art and activism. Whether I’m working with film, poetry, music, or prose I believe that my work should be somewhat weaponized. With Beachy Head, my focus surrounds topics pertaining to the African diaspora and the trauma that is felt throughout it. I was inspired by Koleka Putuma’s spoken word poem “Water” which is about the stereotype of Black people throughout the diaspora being afraid of water or unable to swim. Sharon Bridgforth’s play Delta Dandi also references this idea, tracing generationally held fears through what she calls the “heart mind.” What if, I thought, this is because of inherited fear stemming from the Middle Passage--a sort of collective memory? Thus, my goal with Beachy Head is to trace, examine, and represent the trauma of Black womanhood through one Black woman’s trauma, memories, and repression.

 

As a college student, especially at a large university like Cornell, I never had much access to quiet, peace, or isolation. I live in a rowdy co-op with twenty other twenty-somethings, and my social life is extremely active. I love this, however it's not very conducive to Beachy Head, which is the first piece I've worked on that's so meditative and reflective. I believe that the environment at Centre Pompadour will be ideal for working on a novel like this. Not only is it led by Michaela's unabashedly bitchy feminist artistic work, it is also located in the middle of nowhere, so as to give artists space to reflect, think, and create. There, I will finish my novel in an environment that allows me to reflect on my own cultural memory while I write while participating in a vibrant community of likeminded artists and feminist thinkers. I'll be a recent graduate and more ready than ever to start working seriously towards being a professional artist and sharpening the knife that is my art.

 

What I Need & What You Get

Centre Pompadour is a "post-capitalistic undertaking," in that the fees for artists are flexible. However, I will still need $800 for my plane journey there, an additional few hundred for food (the "starving artist" trope is not as glamorous in real life), $160 for a French Rosetta Stone, and at least $1,000 for self publishing in the fall. During my residency, I'm also planning on squeezing in a trip to East Sussex, the setting of my novel, to stand on the real Beachy Head and complete a photography series of the cliff. To make all of this happen, I need your help. 

For any contribution, you'll receive the priceless gift of knowing you've helped a young artist get her start. But there are material gifts too, if that's what you're into. For $10+ your name will be listed in the dedication of this novel. For $25+ you'll receive glossy 4x6 photos from Beachy Head. For $30 you'll receive an e-book of Beachy Head. For $40+ you'll receive a signed copy of the book when it's published or self-published. For $75+ you'll receive all of the above plus a handwritten, original poem. For $100+ you'll receive all of the above plus 2 hours of free editing services (screenplays, resumes, novels, essays, I do it all). Any contribution of any amount also comes with my undying and unconditional love, appreciation, and gratitude. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love has no monetary value. Whether I barely raise a dime or I raise triple my goal amount, please know that I am so grateful to anyone who has taken the time to read about this undertaking of mine. If you are financially unable to give, you can still help support me by sharing this campaign and spreading the word.

story:
Avery's story began ten years ago and because of the support of my amazing friends and family, it was completed last month.  I have two agents looking at the book now, deciding whether or not to acquire it and begin the publishing process. 
As I wait for their decision, the next book, about Avery's mother's clan, is exploding in my mind, begging to be written.  So, I have decided to go to Iceland for research.  By going to Ireland to visit with Avery's clan, I went from 14,000 words to 91,000 words and a completed manuscript in 7 months.  I am hoping Annadia's story will expand in the same way through my experiences in the amazing landscape of Iceland.  
Writing has been a dream of mine for as long as I can remember.  My friends and their strong support and belief in this dream has helped me more than I can ever express.  I had no idea when I began the journey of writing Avery's story that I would also begin a literal journey to magnificent places and meet amazing people.
I am asking for financial support to help me fund the plane ticket, hostels, and food while I am in Iceland.  However, even if you cannot support this project financially, I am truly grateful for all of your emotional support on this path toward my dream.
In addition, I would be very grateful if you could forward this campaign on to anyone you think may be interested in contributing.
Thank you!!!!
Go raibh maith agat!!!!
Takk!!!!

story:
Campaign

About

Greek summer: Young teenagers (Greek, American, alien, half-alien) live amazing adventures, dance the syrtaki and use unimagined technology within the mystery of the Greek light, the timeless nature of the Aegean Sea, the sun and the air. They sway between myth and reality and they battle with legendary creatures from Greek myths and history such as Keres, Tritons, Themistocles and Talos. That’s what you get in Poseidon’s Charm!

 

The book

Christophoros is a “next-door” Greek-American teenager spending his summer holidays in Greece. A weird, silent boatman transfers him through one of the Myriad Rivers (ruled by Hades, the god of Death) somewhere in the Aegean Sea, straight to a summer camp of Ionian teenagers who are aliens from Planet Ion. Christophoros will find out about his mysterious birth on Mount Olympus-the Mount of gods, and that he is half-Ionian. He is immersed in the campers’ way of life; he makes new friends and enemies.

However, the camp is in danger. The half-human, half-alien boy is the only one who can travel between the two worlds and at different times. He is the only one who can find Poseidon’s Charm which is the only way for the Ionians to open the galactic gate to their way home and escape a painful death.

This is the beginning of the most dangerous quest of Christophoros’ life! Not having any clue where to search for the Charm, Christophoros and his friends will travel in Delphi, Crete and Mycenae, in the present and in the past, where the heroes will many times put their lives in danger. They will meet Pythia and the Centaurs, dance in a Cretan wedding, enjoy the sunset at Santorini, battle with Talos, Tritons and Lethe. Christophoros will be chased by the Apostate and the Cylonists. He will break the Chains of Time. Although he has powerful enemies, he has true friends and the support of the eternal Gaia and exotic Aphrodite to help him during his difficult quest!

Will Christophoros and his friends overcome the difficulties, beat the clock and bring  Poseidon’s Charm to the Ionian camp? Will they manage to save the Ionians from death?

Please, read two indicative excerpts here

If you can understand Greek, listen to some of the book’s chapters here.

                                                       

Been said for the novel:

 “The truth is that it is quite difficult to categorize the novel within young adults' literature. Is it a book of adventure? This is obvious! Is it a fantasy book? According to Darko Suvin, it surely is, since it offers an alternative to the global setting in which we live.  Is it science fiction? Of course, it is! Aliens, spaceships, physical laws and scientific principles extended. However, there are significant elements of historical fiction, too. Besides its precise references to historic events, according to many researchers, mythologies such as the Greek one, are actually the non-written history. Myths are nothing but the reflection, crystallization and condensation of historical narratives, accumulated in the collective memory of ancient societies and transmitted orally from one generation to another. Therefore, it is quite obvious that the Poseidon’s Charm is a brilliant, multifaceted novel,  a wonderful debut with just the right kind of plot twists that keep you turning pages!”   

  Alexis Kalesis, Doctor of Comparative Literature,  Professor, Journalist

“In the framework of the educational character of the novel, the writer intents to pass social messages such as love for the nature and the environment, the meaning of duty and solidarity with people, friendship, faith; I mean, besides the fantasy and the adventure, the Poseidon’s Charm is a book to build character and teach our children significant values.  The book stimulates the mind, expands the vocabulary and exemplifies important viewpoints.”

                                    Evi Mpoumpoulis, MSc, Teacher of Primary Education

"With the Poseidon’s Charm, Glykeria Karagouni creates a strong, attractive novel with a cinematic flow for young – and not only – readers. She marries mythology with the contemporary life overtaking us with their masterful coupling   with future technology and the alien world as well as with deeper concerns and reflections… I would describe it as literature of high quality; it creates healthy moral and ethical patterns and presents valuable insights."  Angeliki Anagnostou, Philologist & Artist

 

Inspiration

 

 

Panayiota

in preparatory stage for

Arts, Design & Architecture

 

Kyriakos

Artist

in preparatory stage for

Animation Studies

 

 

 

 

 

The Minotaur

   

 

The why

I love fantasy novels. As a Greek woman, I have been living my whole life at the foothills of Mount Olympus, the home of the Greek gods, next to Mount Pelion with the Centaurs and close to Litochoro village with the strange, still-unexplained phenomena and the exceptional Aegean Sea. Inevitably, I grew up with the Greek myths and legends (and, oh my God!!! Greek mythology is vast and fascinating!). On the other hand, the marvels of Ancient Greek Technology and all those ancient Greek inventors like Archimedes and Heron inspired me to become a mechanical engineer.

I dreamed of a novel with a harmonious blend of adventure and Greek elements of mythology, tradition and history along with science fiction, aliens and alien technology. It is engaging and fascinating, with the Greek identity beyond doubt. 

The inspiration of this book came to me in 2005 when a Greek summer wind stumbled on the clear sea waters of Velika, Thessaly. The very first lines of the book describe the stormy sea of that day!

At once intensely Greek and cosmopolitan, full of adventures, filled with images of the Greek breeze, light and purity, the 340-page novel intends to immerse everyone- children, young adult and older readers- in intense action and illuminate the Greek spirit. Unimagined technology blends harmonically with the authentic Greek myth experience in its own home-place together with contemporary Greek culture and lifestyle. Traditions and local mores, religion, music, food and flavors, the stories and secrets of the Greek land and sea compose the background for this fantasy adventurous novel with its young heroes to live on the edge of myth and reality.

And yes! In Greece, one can never tell where fiction ends and where history begins…

I really hope the story and characters will capture the readers’ hearts!

 

This is where you come in, dear readers! Your contribution will help to smooth the process of   the translation, publication and presentation of this book.

 

About the Author

        Glykeria S. Karagouni

   Mother of two fantastic girls, Μechanical Εngineer PhD,   working in the industry and for the Greek Army Aviation  Technical Support for a number of years. An academic since  2005 (University of Thessaly, Greece) and a writer of novels,   she has been awarded twice for children’s and teen’s books by the «Greek Women’s Literary Team».

  For more information you can connect with me at                             g_karagouni@yahoo.gr and on Facebook

 

 

What I Need & What You Get

My vision is to have “Poseidon’s Charm” translated in English and available as a digital book on Kindle and other e-book stores. God willing and you supporting the project, I would love to publish it in paperback and -why not - hardcover!

All supporters will have their name listed on the special “thank you” page of the e-book. Furthermore:

  • For $5 (4€), you will get a personal thank you e-mail AND your name on the special “thank you” page of the e-book as a supporter.

 

  • For $20 (18€), you will get a digital copy of the book AND a personal thank you e-mail AND your name on the special “thank you” page of the e-book as a supporter.

 

  • For $50 (45€), you will get a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND a personal “thank you” e-mail AND your name on  the special thank you page of the e-book as a supporter AND as soon as I manage to produce widely physical copies, a paperback print. Physical books (paperback prints) will be shipped via postal service, though delivery time may vary.

 

  • For $100 (90€), you will get one signed and limited exclusive edition hardcover print of the "Poseidon's Charm", specially printed for you, AND a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND a personal thank you e-mail, AND your name on the special “thank you” page of the e-book as a supporter. Physical books will be shipped via postal service.

 

  • For $200 (180€), you will get two signed and limited exclusive edition hardcover prints of the "Poseidon's Charm", specially printed for you, AND a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND a personal thank you e-mail, AND your name on the special “thank you” page of the e-book as a supporter. Physical books will be shipped via postal service.

 

  • For $500 (450€), you will get two signed and limited exclusive edition hardcover prints of the "Poseidon's Charm", specially printed for you, with the option to include a personal message inside – anywhere in the world, AND three (3) nights at the rooms where the adventure of the Poseidon’s Charm started, Lepeniotis apartments, AND a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND a personal thank you e-mail AND your name on the special “thank you” page of the e-book as a supporter. (Please note that the perk refers to one apartment for 1 to 4 people purchase of three (3) nights, terms of the host – no air tickets or other type of transport included, contact for booking should be until end March 2020 for Summer 2020 or March 2021 for Summer 2021. More details in contact with me). Physical books will be shipped via postal service, though delivery time may vary.

 

  • For $1,500 (1350€), you will get THREE signed and limited exclusive edition hardcover prints of the "Poseidon's Charm", specially printed for you, with a personal message inside – anywhere in the world, AND ONE week (6 nights) at the rooms where the adventure of the Poseidon’s Charm started, Lepeniotis apartments and two lunch or dinner events with the writer AND a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND a personal thank you e-mail AND your name and photo (if you wish) on a separate special “thank you” page of the e-book as a "great supporter". (Please note that the perk refers to one apartment for 1 to 4 people purchase of six (6) nights, terms of the host – no air tickets or other type of transport included, contact for booking should be until end March 2020 for Summer 2020 or March 2021 for Summer 2021. More details in contact with me) . Physical books  will be shipped via postal service, though delivery time may vary.

AND...

 

  • For $5,000 (4,500€), you will get FOUR signed and limited exclusive edition hardcover prints of the "Poseidon's Charm", specially printed for you, with a personal message inside – anywhere in the world AND a digital copy of the book with a message of the author, AND ONE week (6 nights) at the rooms where the adventure of the "Poseidon’s Charm" started, Lepeniotis apartments, and two lunch or dinner events with the writer AND ONE week (6 nights) at Palaios Panteleimonas (located at Olympus Mount, the place of  Christophoros’ birth) whenever you wish and three lunch or dinner events with the writer,  AND a personal thank you e-mail AND your name and photo (if you wish) on a separate special “thank you” page of the e-book as a "great supporter". (Please note that the perk refers to one apartment for 1 to 4 people purchase of six (6) nights at Lepeniotis Apartments and six(6) nights at one apartment for 1 to 4 people  at Palaios Panteleimonas chosen by me, terms of the hosts – no air tickets included. If by air, transport from and to Thessaloniki or Athens airport included. Transport from Velika to Palaios Panteleimonas included. Car rent or other transportaion for other reasons and places not included. Contact for booking should be until end March 2020 for Summer 2020 or March 2021 for Summer 2021. The property to stay at Palaios Panteleimonas will be communicated when a perk for 5,000 is selected. More details in contact with me). Physical books will be shipped via postal service, though delivery time may vary.

 

Please, review the list of perks on the right-side of the campaign page and click on them. If you wish to contribute financially select the perk for you to continue with the contribution check out process.

 

The amount

100% of the money of this Indiegogo Campaign will cover the initial costs of the novel’s translation and digital edition. Funding above and beyond the initial goal would allow for the paperback printing and some advertising.

 

 

Acknowledgements:

I cannot express enough thanks to my friends for their dedicated efforts in contributing to this campaign. Without their voluntary work, their continued support and encouragement, this campaign would have never been on air! 

A special thank you to:

Nikos Vasiloglou and his daughter Ismini (Atlanta, Georgia, USA) who were the very reason that I started this campaign and provided me with all necessary technicalities and other facilitations to create and launch the campaign.

Sophia Koustas (Manchester, New Hampshire, USA)

Fani Motesnitsa (Aberdeen, Scotland)

Katerina Mantzani (North Andover, Massachusetts, USA)

For their encouragement during the preparation of this campaign, their valuable advice all the way long for all small and big issues and their support regarding networking around the globe.

Panos Anargyros who narrated the chapters of the Greek book and was patient enough to repeat some parts several times to satisfy me!

Argιris Giouroukis for the beautiful introductory video

Kyriakos and Panayiota for their awesome art.

The National Herald/Εθνικός Κήρυξ, the only daily Greek-language newspaper in the United States and especially Mrs Veta Diamataris for the support!

Christos Malaspinas, journalist, for the interview in the Panhellenic Post, The Online Newspaper of Hellenism

Demetris Vrontis for sharing information within the EMRBI society.

Diamantis Gikas for sharing information within the Global Federation of Thessalian Associations society

Eleni and Stella (my daughters) for their support, help and encouragement!

And all friends and relatives that spread the word and support this effort!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge is delivering the finished book to the supporter, specifically the paperback edition.  I will be working closely with the publisher to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you.  Supporters who expect a paperback book will be informed in detail about the process and will be informed when the pre-ordered copies are expected to ship.

   

Other Ways You Can Help

Would you like to contribute but you are unable to support the novel financially?

Oh, yes! You can contribute and, please, do!

  • Please, make some noise about the novel! Share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn and other social media with your family, friends and network. Give them the link.
  • Please use #The Poseidon’s Charm   I can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
  • Connect with me on Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram

 

If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact me - just send me an e-mail, chat with me, or comment on Indiegogo!

Harry Potter is English, Percy Jackson is American. Whether you are Greek or have a Greek inspired soul or a Greek mentality or you just happen to love Greek culture, I invite you to join the journey of making Christophoros, the Greek hero of fantasy literature, famous around the globe!

 

A huge thank you to all of you for your kind support!

Glykeria S. Karagouni

“In the framework of the educational character of the novel, the writer intents to pass social messages such as love for the nature and the environment, the meaning of duty and solidarity with people, friendship, faith; I mean, besides the fantasy and the adventure, the Poseidon’s Charm  is a book to build character and teach our children significant values.  The book stimulates the mind, expands the vocabulary and exemplifies important viewpoints.”
                                    Evi Mpoumpoulis, MSc, Teacher of Primary Education
"With the Poseidon’s Charm, Glykeria Karagouni creates a strong, attractive novel with a cinematic flow for young – and not only – readers. She marries mythology with the contemporary life overtaking us with their masterful coupling   with future technology and the alien world as well as with deeper concerns and reflections… I would describe it as literature of high quality; it creates healthy moral and ethical patterns and presents valuable insights."  Angeliki Anagnostou, Philologist & Artist
 
Inspiration


 



 



Panayiota
in preparatory stage for
Arts, Design & Architecture





 
Kyriakos 
Artist
in preparatory stage for
Animation Studies
 
 
 



 
 
The Minotaur



 
 

 
The why
I love fantasy novels. As a Greek woman, I have been living my whole life at the foothills of Mount Olympus, the home of the Greek gods, next to Mount Pelion with the Centaurs and close to Litochoro village with the strange, still-unexplained phenomena and the exceptional Aegean Sea. Inevitably, I grew up with the Greek myths and legends (and, oh my God!!! Greek mythology is vast and fascinating!). On the other hand, the marvels of Ancient Greek Technology and all those ancient Greek inventors like Archimedes and Heron inspired me to become a mechanical engineer.

I dreamed of a novel with a harmonious blend of adventure and Greek elements of mythology, tradition and history along with science fiction, aliens and alien technology. It is engaging and fascinating, with the Greek identity beyond doubt. 
The inspiration of this book came to me in 2005 when a Greek summer wind stumbled on the clear sea waters of Velika, Thessaly. The very first lines of the book describe the stormy sea of that day!

At once intensely Greek and cosmopolitan, full of adventures, filled with images of the Greek breeze, light and purity, the 340-page novel intends to immerse everyone- children, young adult and older readers- in intense action and illuminate the Greek spirit. Unimagined technology blends harmonically with the authentic Greek myth experience in its own home-place together with contemporary Greek culture and lifestyle. Traditions and local mores, religion, music, food and flavors, the stories and secrets of the Greek land and sea compose the background for this fantasy adventurous novel with its young heroes to live on the edge of myth and reality.
And yes! In Greece, one can never tell where fiction ends and where history begins…
I really hope the story and characters will capture the readers’ hearts!
 
This is where you come in, dear readers! Your contribution will help to smooth the process of   the translation, publication and presentation of this book.
 
About the Author
        Glykeria S. Karagouni
   Mother of two fantastic girls, Μechanical Εngineer PhD,   working in the industry and for the Greek Army Aviation  Technical Support for a number of years. An academic since  2005 (University of Thessaly, Greece) and a writer of novels,   she has been awarded twice for children’s and teen’s books by the «Greek Women’s Literary Team».
  For more information you can connect with me at                             g_karagouni@yahoo.gr and on Facebook

story:
¿Qué?

Sé que me ves es una novela profunda acerca de los paradigmas del mundo en el que vivimos, de la sociedad que vamos moldeando entre todos.

Aquel lunes lluvioso de febrero, Andrea Solozábal se acercó, tal y como acostumbraba, hasta la estación más cercana a su hogar. Para su sorpresa, una larga cola se extendía desde la boca del metro hasta los edificios colindantes. Luego, toda aquella congregación escuchó el escandaloso sonido de una sirena, vislumbró las parpadeantes luces de un vehículo de bomberos y varios coches de policía.

La gente utilizaba sus teléfonos móviles hasta que todo comenzó a normalizarse. Entonces viajó entre toda esa grisácea congregación. Se vio sumida en su vida cotidiana y observó cosas que, al parecer, los demás no veían. Sé que me ves, decía su mente. Y se lo dijo durante mucho tiempo. Quizá demasiado. Hasta que, finalmente, comprobó con sus propios ojos que allí nadie, nada veía.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a S.H. López-Pastor.

Natural de Bizkaia y afincado en Haro (La Rioja), es licenciado en Sociología por la UPV. Este escritor errante, a lo largo de los años ha conseguido conocer a casi once mil de sus lectores de manera directa y personal en la comunidad de La Rioja y sus provincias limítrofes.

Sé que me ves es su novena publicación. Y, esta novela, así como las anteriores, es un nuevo capítulo que se añade a esta increíble historia.

http://shlopezpastorlb.wixsite.com/shlopezpastor

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Pero algo, contra todo pronóstico, le llamó la atención ahí fuera. Se trataba de una luz. Una luz siniestra bajo aquella nueva prohibición. Justo debajo de aquel mensaje que aconsejaba no acceder a la vía. Era una luz tenue. Una luminiscencia que destacaba del fondo oscuro en aquel punto de aquella estación. Más concretamente, del fondo oscuro de la parte inferior del andén. Bajo las mismas letras. Estaba escondida. No. Mejor, sobresalía de aquel negror que, al parecer, para todo el mundo pasaba tan desapercibido.
          La señal acústica volvió a señalar apremio.
          La gente había entrado y las puertas comenzaron a cerrarse.
          Los ojos de Andrea, por su parte, no podían dejar de mirar con curiosidad y a cada momento más inquietos, hacia un punto bajo el andén. ¿Qué demonios era esa luz? Parecía… pero…, ¿No podía ser? ¿Quién…? ¿Por qué…?, ¿por qué alguien… por qué demonios iba alguien a sentarse bajo el andén…, observando con gran atención la pantalla de su móvil?
           El metro comenzó a desplazarse mientras los ojos de la sorprendida mujer no podían desclavarse de aquel punto que tanto llegaba a inquietarla. Susurró palabras ininteligibles. Logró desligar su mirar de aquel siniestro punto para observar a los pasajeros. Muchos con sus móviles. Indiferentes. Ignorantes. Sus ojos preguntaban cuestiones que no se articulaban. Solicitaban respuestas que nunca brotaban. Volvían a mirar a través del templado vidrio del vagón que ya iba tomando velocidad. El punto luminoso ofrecía un ¿rostro? ¿Era cierto que allí, bajo el andén hubiera una persona acurrucada mirando su móvil? Con gran incredulidad, volvió su mirar al interior. Más miradas embobecidas. Silencio corrompido por los quejidos de la estructura rodante. Nadie reparaba en ella. Quiso gritar. Detener el vehículo articulado. Levantarse, señalar a través del cristal y gritar con fuerza:

¡¡Hay una persona en el andén!».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y S.H. López-Pastor vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
Le projet

L'association locale Avenir Social Rhône-Alpes Auvergne (ASRA) avec l'aide du Mouvement des libérés ambitionne de créer le premier livret explicatif des enjeux de la liberté de protection sociale. Concret pour ne pas ennuyer les lecteurs, au ton léger pour rendre le sujet accessible, professionnel et référencé pour le rendre crédible aux yeux de tous.

Pourquoi un Livret ?

Vous êtes en week-end, en train de discuter en famille après un repas copieux. Comme souvent, après les discussions politiques arrive le débat sur l’âge de départ à la retraite et le « trou de la  sécu » sur lequel chacun donne son avis. Dans la conversation, vous expliquez avoir une protection sociale privée qui vous coute 10 fois moins cher. Face à vous, tatie Danielle, 72 ans, vous attaque frontalement : « La sécurité sociale est le meilleur système au monde, qui a d’ailleurs été créée par les résistants. Non seulement tu n’es pas solidaire, mais tu risques de finir en prison. Si on pouvait quitter la sécurité sociale, ça se saurait ! Combien êtes-vous à l’avoir quitté, d’ailleurs ? 472 ? J’ai entendu que des personnes ont été condamnées et qu’elles ont tout perdu du jour au lendemain. Si ça t’arrive, tu seras bien content de revenir dans le système-que-tout-le-monde-nous-envie ! ».

On pourrait continuer le discours pendant un moment, mais vous aurez compris le principe. Le livret vous permettra de fermer le clapet de tatie Danielle une bonne fois pour toute. Il répondra à toutes les bêtises habituelles, et donnera des sources, références et réponses claires pour ne pas remettre en cause son contenu.

Ce livret est aussi fait pour vos rencontres impromptues : le commerçant du coin râle au sujet du RSI ? Vous avez certains collègues qui s’intéressent aux alternatives à la sécurité sociale pseudo-monopolistique française ? Le meilleur cadeau que vous puissiez leur faire, c’est le Livret de l’apprenti libéré. Glissez-leur le livret et laissez le temps agir. Les informations, chiffres, réponses et débats qu’il renfermera, avec des liens pour continuer l’exploration, leur permettra de s’intéresser au sujet, le dédiaboliser et à les soutenir dans l’approfondissement de leurs recherches d’information. Par la suite, vos contacts reviendront naturellement vers vous en étant plus attentifs, convaincus, et davantage ouvert d’esprit pour des échanges constructifs sur le sujet.

Tatie Danielle quant à elle n’aura plus le dernier mot lors des repas de famille.


Pourquoi nous soutenir ?

Simplement pour ce chiffre : 183.

183 indépendants ou petits patrons se suicideraient chaque année. D’autres sources évoquent des chiffres deux à trois fois plus élevés.

Chez Avenir Social, on est confronté à ce problème de manière hebdomadaire : les burnouts de certains de nos membres, les e-mails de demande d’aide, mais aussi et surtout l’incompréhension et la grande détresse des indépendants qui nous contactent. La situation nous révolte, et nous voulons agir. Pour les indépendants au bout du rouleau, pour nous, et pour que les 183 braves entrepreneurs qui mettent fin à leurs jours chaque année ne soient pas partis pour rien. Le système social intenable actuel doit cesser.

Si nous avons besoin de vous, c’est aussi parce que créer un Livret complet et professionnel, outre du temps de rédaction, ça demande une réelle maitrise pour le rendre crédible visuellement auprès des milliers de personnes qui l’auront dans leur main, dont une partie ne sera pas forcément convaincue au départ. Cela nécessite aussi une somme d’argent minimum pour l’imprimer en de nombreux exemplaires et réaliser des économies d’échelle. Et on ne vous parle pas des frais de préparation et d’expédition.

Pour cela, nous avons besoin de vous pour lancer notre projet : si vous souhaitez amener une pierre à l’édifice, votre aide financière et votre bienveillance sont les bienvenues. Une fois créé, le Livret de l’apprenti libéré pourra être distribué à des coûts très faibles dans tout l’Hexagone et ses DOM-TOM, dans le but de démocratiser et rendre accessible des informations justes, claires et professionnelles.

Ce dont nous avons besoin


Objectifs de la levée de fond

  • 100% : Création du livret et première vague d’impression
  • 150% : Création de la vidéo « Quitter la sécu pour les nuls » : explicatif clair et précis du concept en vidéo d’animation (motion design) à diffuser à ses contacts sans modération
  • 170% : Sabrage de bouteilles de champagne au siège du RSI et publication de la vidéo. Les bénéfices seront versés dans le fonds d’entraide de l’association pour soutenir les libérés en ayant besoin (a déjà permis de soutenir cet été 3 personnes)
  • Au-delà de 200% : Création du volume 2, le Livret du libéré, pour aller plus loin dans les réflexions : Quel comportement avoir face à un huissier, quoi et comment se rendre insaisissable selon son régime matrimonial, la marche à suivre pour l'ouverture de comptes à l’étranger, comparatif et détail des différents contrats de santé proposés, exemples concrets de situations d’entrepreneurs…

Calendrier prévisionnel

Je n'ai pas les moyens de vous aider

Vous ne pouvez peut-être pas contribuer financièrement à la mise en place du projet. Aidez-nous en diffusant cette page à vos contacts, que ce soit par e-mail, sur les réseaux sociaux, ou même oralement ! La réussite du projet dépend de votre mobilisation.

Dans le cas où vos revenus ne vous permettent pas de vous procurer le livret, une solution alternative existe : les gros donateurs contribueront à l’envoi de Livrets aux personnes en ayant besoin. C’est ça, la solidarité entre libérés.

L'équipe

Notre bande de joyeux lurons s’évertue depuis plus d’un an à prôner la liberté de la protection sociale auprès des petites entreprises en région Rhône-Alpes-Auvergne, tout en proposant via l’association un suivi et une proximité entre les libérés et sympathisants adhérents.

Avec 11 réunions organisées dans la région Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes en 2015 (la majorité avec Claude Reichman, et ce n’est pas encore fini !), l’évènement de La Rentrée des Libérés et le déploiement d’une banderole XXL devant le RSI, l’asso a de quoi se maintenir occupée. Et on se marre bien, il faut l’avouer.
story_txt:
Le projet
L'association locale Avenir Social Rhône-Alpes Auvergne (ASRA) avec l'aide du Mouvement des libérés ambitionne de créer le premier livret explicatif des enjeux de la liberté de protection sociale. Concret pour ne pas ennuyer les lecteurs, au ton léger pour rendre le sujet accessible, professionnel et référencé pour le rendre crédible aux yeux de tous.


Pourquoi un Livret ?

Vous êtes en week-end, en train de discuter en famille après un repas copieux. Comme souvent, après les discussions politiques arrive le débat sur l’âge de départ à la retraite et le « trou de la  sécu » sur lequel chacun donne son avis. Dans la conversation, vous expliquez avoir une protection sociale privée qui vous coute 10 fois moins cher. Face à vous, tatie Danielle, 72 ans, vous attaque frontalement : « La sécurité sociale est le meilleur système au monde, qui a d’ailleurs été créée par les résistants. Non seulement tu n’es pas solidaire, mais tu risques de finir en prison. Si on pouvait quitter la sécurité sociale, ça se saurait ! Combien êtes-vous à l’avoir quitté, d’ailleurs ? 472 ? J’ai entendu que des personnes ont été condamnées et qu’elles ont tout perdu du jour au lendemain. Si ça t’arrive, tu seras bien content de revenir dans le système-que-tout-le-monde-nous-envie ! ».
On pourrait continuer le discours pendant un moment, mais vous aurez compris le principe. Le livret vous permettra de fermer le clapet de tatie Danielle une bonne fois pour toute. Il répondra à toutes les bêtises habituelles, et donnera des sources, références et réponses claires pour ne pas remettre en cause son contenu.
Ce livret est aussi fait pour vos rencontres impromptues : le commerçant du coin râle au sujet du RSI ? Vous avez certains collègues qui s’intéressent aux alternatives à la sécurité sociale pseudo-monopolistique française ? Le meilleur cadeau que vous puissiez leur faire, c’est le Livret de l’apprenti libéré. Glissez-leur le livret et laissez le temps agir. Les informations, chiffres, réponses et débats qu’il renfermera, avec des liens pour continuer l’exploration, leur permettra de s’intéresser au sujet, le dédiaboliser et à les soutenir dans l’approfondissement de leurs recherches d’information. Par la suite, vos contacts reviendront naturellement vers vous en étant plus attentifs, convaincus, et davantage ouvert d’esprit pour des échanges constructifs sur le sujet.
Tatie Danielle quant à elle n’aura plus le dernier mot lors des repas de famille.




Pourquoi nous soutenir ?

Simplement pour ce chiffre : 183.


183 indépendants ou petits patrons se suicideraient chaque année. D’autres sources évoquent des chiffres deux à trois fois plus élevés.
Chez Avenir Social, on est confronté à ce problème de manière hebdomadaire : les burnouts de certains de nos membres, les e-mails de demande d’aide, mais aussi et surtout l’incompréhension et la grande détresse des indépendants qui nous contactent. La situation nous révolte, et nous voulons agir. Pour les indépendants au bout du rouleau, pour nous, et pour que les 183 braves entrepreneurs qui mettent fin à leurs jours chaque année ne soient pas partis pour rien. Le système social intenable actuel doit cesser.
Si nous avons besoin de vous, c’est aussi parce que créer un Livret complet et professionnel, outre du temps de rédaction, ça demande une réelle maitrise pour le rendre crédible visuellement auprès des milliers de personnes qui l’auront dans leur main, dont une partie ne sera pas forcément convaincue au départ. Cela nécessite aussi une somme d’argent minimum pour l’imprimer en de nombreux exemplaires et réaliser des économies d’échelle. Et on ne vous parle pas des frais de préparation et d’expédition.
Pour cela, nous avons besoin de vous pour lancer notre projet : si vous souhaitez amener une pierre à l’édifice, votre aide financière et votre bienveillance sont les bienvenues. Une fois créé, le Livret de l’apprenti libéré pourra être distribué à des coûts très faibles dans tout l’Hexagone et ses DOM-TOM, dans le but de démocratiser et rendre accessible des informations justes, claires et professionnelles.

Ce dont nous avons besoin






Objectifs de la levée de fond




100% : Création du livret et première vague d’impression


150% : Création de la vidéo « Quitter la sécu pour les nuls » : explicatif clair et précis du concept en vidéo d’animation (motion design) à diffuser à ses contacts sans modération


170% : Sabrage de bouteilles de champagne au siège du RSI et publication de la vidéo. Les bénéfices seront versés dans le fonds d’entraide de l’association pour soutenir les libérés en ayant besoin (a déjà permis de soutenir cet été 3 personnes)


Au-delà de 200% : Création du volume 2, le Livret du libéré, pour aller plus loin dans les réflexions : Quel comportement avoir face à un huissier, quoi et comment se rendre insaisissable selon son régime matrimonial, la marche à suivre pour l'ouverture de comptes à l’étranger, comparatif et détail des différents contrats de santé proposés, exemples concrets de situations d’entrepreneurs…
